name: A pale ring of old dried bones
data: It increases the users wisdom slightly.
It increases the users intelligence slightly.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'power manipulation'.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'focus dark energies'.
